mapper.insert: insert into f_user_info (fid, fuid, fname, fphone, fzipcode, fprov, fcity, fdist, faddress, fcreatetime, version) values (#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fzipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fprov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: UPDATE f_user_info SET fuid = #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fname = #{fname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fphone = #{fphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fzipcode = #{fzipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fprov = #{fprov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcity = #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fdist = #{fdist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, faddress = #{faddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcreatetime = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = version + 1 WHERE fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fid, fuid, fname, fphone, fzipcode, fprov, fcity, fdist, faddress, fcreatetime, version from f_user_info where fuid = #{fuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
